content: I have translated the NNG into Chinese. How can I jump to any point I want? I don't what to fully go though the game again.
isn't there a "relaxed mode" that turns off the level gating?
there is a toggle on the main page, if you change it from "regular" to "relaxed" then you can go to any world by selecting it in the level selector
Also you can just type the URL of a world in, it will not prevent you from loading it even in regular mode

Mario Carneiro said:

Also you can just type the URL of a world in, it will not prevent you from loading it even in regular mode

I never clicked that.... :joy: I work so hard to find something like debug in three dashes...
